description: This show TVL lacked in Yearn Finance Products

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false"})) + sum(iearn{param="tvl"}) + sum(yearn{param="tvl"})

panels.description: Aggragate tvl for v2 vaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks", version="v2"}))

panels.title: V2 TVL

targets.expr: (sum(iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}) or vector(0))

panels.description: $ amount of veCRV Yearn.Finance has locked to boost curve vault yield.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: veCRV TVL

panels.description: TVL sum of ape.tax experimental vaults on $networks. These vaults are for testing use them with caution.

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks", version="v2"}))

panels.title: Ape.Tax TVL

panels.description: Amount of funds in old v1 vaults. All tvl is earning 0% apy please migrate asap at yearn.finance.

targets.expr: sum(yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"})

panels.title: V1 tvl

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn v2 yvaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks", version="v2"})) - sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks", version="v2"} offset $tf))

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn v2 yvaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks", version="v2"})) / sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks", version="v2"} offset $tf)) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn v2+v3 yEarn on $networks

targets.expr: (sum(iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}) or vector(0)) - (sum(iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"} offset $tf))

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn v2+v3 yEarn on $networks

targets.expr: sum(iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}) / sum(iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"} offset $tf) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn locked veCRV for curve boosts. This is only on the ETH network.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"})) - (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"})) offset $tf

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn locked veCRV for curve boosts. This is only on the ETH network.

targets.expr: (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"})) / (avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance", network="$networks"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price", network="$networks"}) offset $tf) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn ape.tax vaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks", version="v2"})) - sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks", version="v2"} offset $tf))

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn ape.tax yvaults on $networks

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks", version="v2"})) / sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks", version="v2"} offset $tf)) - 1

panels.description: $tf tvl change - yearn v1 on $networks. If you have funds in yearn v1 please migrate at yearn.finance you are no longer earning yield, all v1 vaults are 0% apy.

targets.expr: sum(yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}) - sum(yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"} offset $tf)

panels.description: $tf tvl % change - yearn v1 on $networks. If you have funds in yearn v1 please migrate at yearn.finance you are no longer earning yield, all v1 vaults are 0% apy.

targets.expr: sum(yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}) / sum(yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"} offset $tf) - 1
yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks"}
sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="false", network="$networks", version="v2"}))

panels.description: Experimental v2 vaults on $network use at your own risk.

targets.expr: yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks"}

panels.title: Ape.Tax TVL

panels.description: Experimental v2 vaults on $network use at your own risk.

targets.expr: sum(sum by (network, vault, address, version) (yearn_vault{param="tvl", experimental="true", network="$networks", version="v2"}))

panels.title: Ape.Tax TVL

targets.expr: iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}

panels.description: Earn v2 and v3 aggregated tvl

targets.expr: sum(iearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"})

panels.title: Earn TVL

targets.expr: yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"}
sum(yearn{param="tvl", network="$networks"})

list.label: network
list.name: networks

list.name: tf
list.query: one day : 1d,one week : 7d,one month : 30d,three months : 90d,one year : 1y

title: Total Value Locked in the Yearn Ecosystem
